yaak.agent.communication.jmx
Class CommunicationServerImpl

java.lang.Object
  yaak.agent.communication.jmx.CommunicationServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationServer, CommunicationServerAdmin
public final class CommunicationServerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommunicationServer, CommunicationServerAdmin

CommunicationServerImpl handles point-to-point and publish/subscribe messaging. This server provides dynamic channel management.

Version:
$Id: CommunicationServerImpl.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith

shutdown

public void shutdown()

Shuts down all network resources. The communication services are activated automatically (on demand) whenever an application configures itself for distributed communications.

This method gracefully closes down all distributed resources, as appropriate, given the communication server's implementation.

If the server, depending on its implementation and API usage, still has dependent threads, the application will have to use System.exit() to close the application.

Specified by:
shutdown in interface CommunicationServerAdmin

close

Closes down a channel.

Specified by:
close in interface CommunicationServer
Parameters:
channelName - The arbitrary channel name.
